resources.string: On Grand Concourse, 99% of drivers were going 20 MPH or faster
On Grand Concourse, 49% of drivers were going 30 MPH or faster
On Grand Concourse, 5% of drivers were going 40 MPH or faster
Pedestrians have a 98% survival rate in a collision with a car going 20 MPH
Pedestrians have a 80% survival rate in a collision with a car going 30 MPH
Pedestrians have a 30% survival rate in a collision with a car going 40 MPH
